h2.div: We as a district are taking precautionary measures as directed by KDHE, KSDE and our Barton County Health Department to address the Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19).

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-wNfPc pSzOP-AhqUyc-wNfPc jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc GNzUNc

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-wNfPc pSzOP-AhqUyc-wNfPc jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: USD 431 will provide FREE meals, breakfast and lunch, for all family members ages 1 -18 beginning March 23rd. Grab ‘n Go meals will be available for curbside pick up in the East parking lot at the Middle School from 11:00 a.m. – 1:00 p.m.
Meals are available for pick up twice a week:
This includes a breakfast and lunch for Monday through Friday each week. Each family member that will be receiving meals, must be in the vehicle to collect the meals at the curbside.
In preparation of the meals, please select the link - Meal Order Form - to give us a count of meals to prepare for your family members, ages 1-18. You will only need to complete this form one time.
This institution is an Equal Opportunity Provider.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-wNfPc pSzOP-AhqUyc-qWD73c jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: KDHE has established a dedicated web page for COVID-19 information and updates. (Click Here) In addition, the web page contains a link to subscribe to updates.
Click Here for information on reducing the spread of germs, and other useful things you need to know about coronavirus.
Click Here for an update from the Barton County Health Department.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-wNfPc pSzOP-AhqUyc-wNfPc jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Click Here to view the Superintendent's Letter to Patrons regarding COVID-19.
